name: First class medical dates

testSteps.description: 1: First class medical dates ({age=35, last medical=8 months ago, next medical=in 4 months, rule=Under 40})

children.description: Given Frank is a 1st class pilot
When Frank's last medical was 8 months ago
Then his next medical should be in 4 months

testSteps.description: 2: First class medical dates ({age=40, last medical=4 months ago, next medical=in 2 months, rule=40 or older})

children.description: Given Frank is a 1st class pilot
When Frank's last medical was 4 months ago
Then his next medical should be in 2 months

testSteps.description: 3: First class medical dates ({age=45, last medical=2 months ago, next medical=in 4 months, rule=40 or older})

children.description: Given Frank is a 1st class pilot
When Frank's last medical was 2 months ago
Then his next medical should be in 4 months

userStory.narrative:
In order to stay compliant with air regulations and continue to fly legally
  As a pilot
  I want to know when my next medical is due

title: First class medical dates

rule.name: First class pilots need a medical exam every 12 months, or every 6 months if they are 40 or older
rule.description:
For ATP (Airline Transport Pilots)
  A Class 1 medical certificate is valid for 12 months, unless you are 40, in which case it is 6 months.

dataTable.scenarioOutline:
Given Frank is a 1st class pilot
And Frank is <age> years old
When Frank's last medical was <last medical>
Then his next medical should be <next medical>
